name: noodle
description: Node and Browser test framework CLI

scripts.test: npm run tmeweb && npm run noodleweb && npm run tmenode && npm run noodlenode
scripts.tmeweb:
echo 'TESTING TME WEB
' && cd udemy/samplewebproject && node ../index.js
scripts.tmenode:
echo 'TESTING TME NODE
' && cd udemy/samplenodeproject && node ../index.js
scripts.noodleweb:
echo 'TESTING NOODLE WEB
' && cd samplewebproject && node ../index.js
scripts.noodlenode:
echo 'TESTING NOODLE NODE
' && cd samplenodeproject && node ../index.js

author: Dave Cartwright
